idea-plugin.name: Github Tools
idea-plugin.description: A small tool to keep track of the Github repositories you have in your organization along with their pull requests, releases and more! It also provides a dependencies viewer and navigator TravisCI and CircleCI integration to go directly to the build itself to monitor it. You can also trigger a TravisCi build and a CircleCi workflow right from the plugin!
idea-plugin.change-notes: Improved dependencies tab. Added new column in repos table to see its status and get right into the CI build itself! Improved dependencies comparator to stash and pop changes Added trigger CircleCI and Travis CI builds from the IDE! Added MVP to the windows for maintenance purposes Improved Github capabilities and fetch performance Added parameters panel to handle tokens Added Apps changelog creation!
